title: Adigvcdh
author: Adigvcdh
content: where and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto token

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 11:49:10 AMwhere and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto tokenNot really sure where you can find investors though, but if by any chance, you can go visit this board, Project Development.It's a long shot, but who knows.Maybe if you can post your project there and made several discussions and explanation, perhaps you could get lucky that someone will message you and be interested on your innovative crypto token. So best of luck to you.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Looking investors and deciding to see all of your posts from your account.I got the website created by you, and I saw the website. I'm not sure you have great things to offer, why? because with the simple things like (Website) you cannot even created/developed by your self.The website using a free-template from wordpress.

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 11:49:10 AMwhere and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto tokenYou can share your project and connect with potential investors here, or on social media platforms like Reddit. Share a bit about yourself, highlighting your past achievements. Provide additional details about your token, including its purpose, uniqueness, goals, and roadmap. Explain the advantages for potential investors. These are just a few of the questions potential backers will have. After all, people are unlikely to invest in something they know very little about.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: If your token is really ultra innovative, you don't have to search for investors because the investors will search your token, just like Bitcoin.Since you're search for investors, I believe your project is just an another scam like most of altcoins in this section. I always feel skeptic when someone is really focus for searching investor or money because it's always related to pump your token.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 11:49:10 AMwhere and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto tokenUltra innovate token word is annoying its like you are presenting unrealistic which people can't trust. Also expect that majority will not like this seeking for investors post since to many scam pass here so for sure many already aware on any schemes and they don't like people offering something to good to be true since they know that it is scam. Many wants result so best present a running product before asking that so people could decide whether its good to invest with you or not.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: Take part in crypto groups, chats, and platforms, and learn as much as you can. There you'll find investors and people who support your "ultra-innovative" coin. Instead of making a pitch, why not start a conversation? You build a reputation by being a real part of this group. And in the crypto world, reputation is worth its weight in... well, Bitcoin

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: First I see you are asking how to promote at a lower cost including the listing do you not have the funds to start this project so say the minimum?Secondly looking for investors to buy your innovative token? I'm not sure your project is so convincing, not that I'm patronizing but the fact there is no chance of advancement in your project this feature is very weak and there is no innovation at all in my opinion.Investors will know which projects to choose, not projects looking for investors.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 11:49:10 AMwhere and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto tokenI doubt that you can easily find angel investors here, although this is the biggest crypto community, this angel investors seldom go here if I'm not mistaken. And as far as your ultra innovative crypto token, not trying to be negative, it seems that the market is already saturated with such innovations.And unless your project is like bitcoin like, meaning prime mover, you might have a hard time trying to get angel investors in your project.But you can frequent other groups though, like Telegram maybe and search for what kind of investors you are looking for.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 11:49:10 AMwhere and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto tokenUltra? That's something out of this world but you have to prove to your potential investors when you pitch deck about that ultra-innovative token that you've got.Honestly, it's hard to find investors nowadays if you're a developer. If you have no self-funding then it's harder for you to get them because you really need funds to at least propose it to many investors.Go to many crypto groups and maybe someone is sharing the same interest as you and sees the potential of what you're working on. It is not going to be easy but you'll be able to find one if you're convincing.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 11:49:10 AMwhere and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto tokenEven i saw that if your token was a red flag after you have been even calling your own token as ultra innovative token. you don't even show what kind of token it is and how can investors are seeing your token as ultra innovative token? Im doubting you will able to find someone who is willing to invest in your token.  Im feeling so scary after you have called your token like that. It sounds like that will be another shady token for sure. Investors are smart and they will never invest in the shitty token that was calling itself as ultra innovative token. Try to prove it. The good project didn't even need to find invetors but investors would be coming for them automatically. I never heard your token and how can an investor which is larger scale than me knew that? You can at least put some words related to your token.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on September 15, 2023, 02:11:41 PMIf your token is really ultra innovative, you don't have to search for investors because the investors will search your token, just like Bitcoin.Since you're search for investors, I believe your project is just an another scam like most of altcoins in this section. I always feel skeptic when someone is really focus for searching investor or money because it's always related to pump your token.This, when a project is any good investors will do anything to get into it early as they can see the potential and the huge profits they can get by supporting the project.Since the OP did not really told us why their project is so innovative then I can only assume they do not have anything to say, and as such this is just another shitcoin like the tens of thousands we have already on the market that do nothing but to waste the good will and the capital of newbie investors.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: X-ray on September 17, 2023, 01:44:49 AMQuote from: Adigvcdh on September 15, 2023, 11:49:10 AMwhere and how to find crypto investors for my ultra innovative crypto tokenEven i saw that if your token was a red flag after you have been even calling your own token as ultra innovative token. you don't even show what kind of token it is and how can investors are seeing your token as ultra innovative token? Im doubting you will able to find someone who is willing to invest in your token.  Im feeling so scary after you have called your token like that. It sounds like that will be another shady token for sure. Investors are smart and they will never invest in the shitty token that was calling itself as ultra innovative token. Try to prove it. The good project didn't even need to find invetors but investors would be coming for them automatically. I never heard your token and how can an investor which is larger scale than me knew that? You can at least put some words related to your token.  I understand your concerns. Calling ourselves 'ultra-innovative' without clear evidence is bold. Let's be clear: Cogitex is a project that has the potential to change the game in artificial intelligence and space exploration. We don't talk empty words, we work on solutions and results. Investors, smart and demanding, can always evaluate the fundamental aspects of a project. And we are ready to provide them with all the necessary information. Let us prove that we are worth your attention.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: wxa7115 on September 17, 2023, 04:35:24 AMQuote from: Apocollapse on September 15, 2023, 02:11:41 PMIf your token is really ultra innovative, you don't have to search for investors because the investors will search your token, just like Bitcoin.Since you're search for investors, I believe your project is just an another scam like most of altcoins in this section. I always feel skeptic when someone is really focus for searching investor or money because it's always related to pump your token.This, when a project is any good investors will do anything to get into it early as they can see the potential and the huge profits they can get by supporting the project.Since the OP did not really told us why their project is so innovative then I can only assume they do not have anything to say, and as such this is just another shitcoin like the tens of thousands we have already on the market that do nothing but to waste the good will and the capital of newbie investors.In fact, your point of view is reminiscent of the situation with the beginning of bitcoin, when many also doubted and thought it was a scam.However, it is important to realize that every innovative project starts with an idea and a belief in its potential. No one is born an expert, and even the most successful projects started with small steps. The cryptocurrency world is developing rapidly, and many projects do bring revolutionary changes in the financial and technological spheres.Our plans include investments in artificial intelligence and space exploration, and we see huge potential in this. However, we also realize that investor confidence needs to be earned. We are working to provide transparent information about our plans and achievements.
